item.description:
Action alert! CVA's bills will have a hearing this Friday March 15th! This is a very important step for these bills, and is your chance to persuade the Environment Committee to support them! You can be sure there will be plenty of opposition, so let's make sure they are outnumbered!

Click the link below for details:

http://www.ctvotesforanimals.org/content.aspx?page_id=22&club_id=86887&module_id=132637&actr=4&sl=166955052

group.name: The New Haven Vegan Meetup Group

item.name: Help pro-animal bills pass this session!
